Uses of Class
us.avn.ws.WeatherStation

    • Uses of WeatherStation in us.avn.ws

      Subclasses of WeatherStation in us.avn.ws 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AcuRite
      Class: AcuRite Description: Specific type of CSV WeatherStation.
      class  NoaaApi 
      class  NoaaXML
      Module: WeatherStation Package: us.avn.ws Class: NoaaXML The NoaaXML class represents the functions of a WeatherStation, particularly the retrieval of the data from the NOAA site for identifier XXXX http://w1.weather.gov/xml/current_obs/XXXX.xml" It returns the values for the fields temp_c, pressure_in, wind_mpg and wind_degrees for the WeatherStation fields WS_TEMPERATURE, WS_PRESSURE, WS_WIND_SPEED, and WS_WIND_DIRECTION.
      class  WsCSV
      Class: WsCSV Description: provides access to the current (last) values of a weather station output in a CSV file.
      Methods in us.avn.ws that return WeatherStation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WeatherStation WeatherStationFactory.getWeatherStation(String wsType, String loc)
      Create a WeatherStation of type wsType, location loc
      Note: For CSV or ACU, the location is the location of the file containing the values; for API and XML it is the appropriate identifier for the NOAA API and XML requests.
